metadata.title: CVE-2014-5021 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Form API in Drupal 6.xbefore 6.32 and possibly 7.x before 7.29 allows remote authenticated userswith the "administer taxonomy" permission to inject arbitrary web script orHTML via an option group label.

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
